alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 18 at 8:20PM CDT until March 20 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. For the second Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Wilkinson, Amite, Pike and Walthall Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM CDT Sunday. For the second Freeze Warning, from 10 PM Sunday night to 10 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
